answers.answer: Hello From the symptoms you stated,  It is possible that you have picked up a bug, but it is also possibleIt could be hypoglycemia-low blood sugar,  Diabetes-High Blood Sugar,A problem with your circulatory system-your heart not pumping enough blood through your body for some reason,A problem with your respiratory system- your not taking in enough oxygen for the heart to pump through.  All these could cause these symptoms.  I recommend you see your doctor if the symptoms continue to determine the exact cause.  I Hope This Helps

Hey!I'm definitely no medical expert, but I am 21 and a diabetic- so I know a fair bit about sickness! lol! i think you should definitely go to the doctors and have this checked out. It may very well be related to stress, but its way better to know and have some peice of mind! :)

question: I am a 22 year old male.  A few days ago I started to feel tired, i thought it was from lack of sleep but the fatigue persisted.  Yesterday in class I got very ligthheaded to the point where I thought I was going to pass out.  I walked outside, got some air, and recovered.  Through the past 2 days, my legs have felt tingly and weak, like they aren't getting enough blood or oxygen or something.  I have been a little stressed lately but I fear it's more than that.  These are my only symptoms, I know they are vague, but could it be something serious?
title: ligtheaded, weak legs, some fatigue
